availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Jane Adams Brown in Oldham County, Kentucky in October 1848. Father of Alonzo Brown, Alice Brown, John Brown, Nathaniel Brown, William Brown, and Thomas Brown. Farmer in Oldham County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Oldham County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 868.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 167B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Ballardsville, p. 2A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film #000482448, p. 478.
Find A Grave, "Hampton Brown (1819-1906)," Memorial #8878752, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/8878752 (accessed September 14, 2020).
